com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb

Class TransformedGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb.TransformedGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph, RenderBatch

    public final class TransformedGraph
extends Object
implements Graph
    This object is a cache for the result of GraphTransformation.transformed().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransformedGraph(GraphTransformation transformation)
      Constructs a new TransformedGraph that is produced via transformation.transformed().

      • isAliveSprout

        public boolean isAliveSprout(Vertex vertex)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Checks whether vertex is a living sprout connected to this Graph.

        A sprout is said to be alive when it is connected to at most 3 Submove edges.

        Specified by:
        isAliveSprout in interface Graph
        Parameters:
        vertex - the Vertex to check
        Returns:
        true if vertex is a living sprout connected to this Graph

      • vertexDegree

        public int vertexDegree(Vertex vertex,
                        Color edgeColor)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Returns the number of edgeColor edges that vertex is connected to in this Graph.
        Specified by:
        vertexDegree in interface Graph
        Parameters:
        vertex - the Vertex to look up the degree for
        edgeColor - the degree is computed by only considering edgeColor edges
        Returns:
        a negative integer, if vertex is not connected to this Graph, the number of edgeColor edges connected to vertex otherwise
